title: BRIEF-Firstwave Cloud Technology Completes $6.6 Mln Placement
text:
BRIEF-Firstwave Cloud Technology Completes $6.6 Mln Placement

Stock Markets 2 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 11:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Firstwave Cloud Technology Completes $6.6 Mln Placement Sept 26 (Reuters) - Firstwave Cloud Technology Ltd : * COMPLETES $6.6 MILLION PLACEMENT TO CONTINUE INTERNATIONAL EXPANSION AND LAUNCHES A SHARE PURCHASE PLAN * COMPLETES $6.6 MILLION PLACEMENT TO CONTINUE INTERNATIONAL EXPANSION AND LAUNCHES A SHARE PURCHASE PLAN
